hero.title: Reliable partner for modern business
hero.subtitle: We build long-term partnerships based on professionalism, responsibility, and understanding our partners' needs.

services.title: Services
services.description: Our services include planning, support, and delivery of IT solutions. A special focus is on integrating system and application software for a reliable, secure, and functional business environment tailored to specific needs.

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: We provide quality IT equipment from renowned global manufacturers, taking into account the specific requirements of each client. Our approach involves careful selection of reliable and economical solutions that provide security and long-term use.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Expert consulting focused on business improvement through detailed analysis of the current state. Development of strategies and recommendations for implementing equipment and software solutions in accordance with real needs and planned usage periods.

engineering.title: Engineering
engineering.description: We design and develop IT solutions relying on expert knowledge and positive experiences. Through careful analysis of structures, systems, and processes, we shape stable, efficient, and long-term sustainable solutions that support business improvement.

about.title: About us
paragraphs: COMPACC COMPANY FOR ENGINEERING, CONSULTING AND TRADE D.O.O. was founded in 1993 as a privately owned limited liability company. The company headquarters is located in Belgrade, municipality of Čukarica, Sremčica, Čitačka 35.

The company is focused on direct cooperation with end users. During 33 years of business, it has cooperated with more than 600 clients from the fields of energy, oil industry, banking, educational and scientific institutions, tourism, and other activities.

Our goal is long-term partnership and customer satisfaction. In accordance with its capabilities, for an extended period, the company has been supporting organizations and associations for nature protection.
The company has a credit rating of AA+ awarded by relevant credit rating agencies.

brands.title: Brands
brands.description: We collaborate with leading global brands to provide you with the best solutions.
